universum.studios.android.setting

Class SettingHeadersAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter<I,VH>
        • universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.SimpleAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
          • universum.studios.android.setting.SettingHeadersAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter, universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.DataSet<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item>, universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.DataSetAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item>, universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ItemsAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item>

    public class SettingHeadersAdapter
extends universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.SimpleAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
    A SimpleAdapter implementation used to provide data set of Items for adapter view that displays a list of setting preferences in the context of SettingsBaseActivity.

    This adapter uses the following view types to provide views for its data set of items:

    • VIEW_TYPE_CATEGORY - view for the category header that has no fragment nor intent associated,
    • VIEW_TYPE_CATEGORY_DIVIDER - view for divider between category headers,
    • VIEW_TYPE_HEADER - view for the selectable header.

    Data set of items with associated headers may be supplied via SettingHeadersAdapter(Context, List) constructor or changed via changeHeaders(List). The current data set of transformed items may be obtained via SimpleAdapter.getItems(). A specific item at a desired position may be obtained via SimpleAdapter.getItem(int) and its associated header via getItem(int).getHeader().

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

      • swapHeaders

        @Nullable
public List<PreferenceActivity.Header> swapHeaders(@Nullable
                                                              List<PreferenceActivity.Header> headers)
        Swaps the current data set of this adapter for the given headers.

        Note, that as this adapter uses multiple view types to present its data set, the specified headers are transformed into data set of Items. The items data set may be obtained via SimpleAdapter.getItems() or a specific item at a desired position via SimpleAdapter.getItem(int). Header associated with an item at a specific position may be obtained via getItem(int).getHeader().

        Parameters:
        headers - The headers for which to create a new data set. May be null to clear the current data set.
        See Also:
        changeHeaders(List)

      • swapItems

        @Nullable
public final List<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item> swapItems(@Nullable
                                                                   List<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item> items)
        Description copied from interface: universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ItemsAdapter
        Changes items data set of this adapter and returns the old items data set.
        Specified by:
        swapItems in interface universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ItemsAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item>
        Overrides:
        swapItems in class universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.SimpleAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        items - The desired items to be changed. May be null to clear the current ones.
        Returns:
        The old items data set or null if this adapter does not have items data set specified.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Use swapHeaders(List) instead.
        See Also:
        ItemsAdapter.getItems()

      • onCreateView

        @NonNull
protected View onCreateView(@NonNull
                                      ViewGroup parent,
                                      int position)
        Description copied from class: universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
        Invoked to create a view for an item from the current data set at the specified position.

        This is invoked only if convertView for the specified position in BaseAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) was null.

        Specified by:
        onCreateView in class universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        parent - A parent view, to resolve correct layout params for the newly creating view.
        position - Position of the item from the current data set for which should be a new view created.
        Returns:
        New instance of the requested view.
        See Also:
        BaseAdapter.inflate(int, ViewGroup)

      • onCreateViewHolder

        @Nullable
protected universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull
                                                                                            View itemView,
                                                                                            int position)
        Description copied from class: universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
        Invoked to create a view holder for a view of an item from the current data set at the specified position.

        This is invoked only if convertView for the specified position in BaseAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) was null, so view along with its corresponding holder need to be created.

        Overrides:
        onCreateViewHolder in class universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        itemView - The same view as obtained from BaseAdapter.onCreateView(ViewGroup, int) for the specified position.
        position - Position of the item from the current data set for which should be a new view holder created.
        Returns:
        New instance of the requested view holder or null if holder for the view is not required.

      • onBindViewHolder

        protected void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                                universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder viewHolder,
                                int position)
        Description copied from class: universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
        Invoked to configure and bind a view of an item from the current data set at the specified position. This is invoked whenever BaseAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) is called.

        Note, that if BaseAdapter.onCreateViewHolder(View, int) returns null for the specified position here passed viewHolder will be the view created by BaseAdapter.onCreateView(ViewGroup, int) for the specified position or just recycled view for that position. This approach may be used when a view hierarchy of a specific item is represented by single custom view, where such view represents a holder for all its child views.

        Specified by:
        onBindViewHolder in class universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter<SettingHeadersAdapter.Item,universum.studios.android.widget.adapter.ViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        viewHolder - The same holder as provided by BaseAdapter.onCreateViewHolder(View, int) for the specified position or converted view as holder as described above.
        position - Position of the item from the current data set of which view to bind with data.
